TopicTitle: BDArmory weapons manager GUI not showing up

Articles.Content:
All the bdarmory parts show up and do work, but when i click the bdarmory icon in flight, the weapon manager GUI doesn't show up.
can anyone help me with fixing this?

Have you fitted a weapon manager? one is required fitted to every craft.

BDA is not compatible with KSP 1.4 at this point.
I have fitted a weapons manager on my craft. And I haven't updated to ksp 1.4, and have a version of BDA that is compatible with 1.3.1

Well in that case a copy of your KSP.log will be required in order for the problem to be diagnosed.  Did you download BDA from the github releases page? If you downloaded elsewhere please delete existing version and reinstall a fresh copy from https://github.com/PapaJoesSoup/BDArmory/releases

And retry the game, post only zipped copys of logs , not plain text versions cheers
